title: 2 bed 1 ba 8 Month Winter Rental Furnished w all utilities
posting_body: Charming Executive 2 bed 1 ba  Move-in ready, fully Furnished Victorian with a huge backyard and mature gardens to enjoy on a quiet, peaceful, safe, dead end street.
Walk to downtown Andover in 8 minutes, close to train, Whole Foods, Post Office, gas stations, drug store, Main Street shopping, dining and entertainment.

Kitchen/Dining room is furnished with dining table and 4 sturdy chairs, all appliances, pots, pans, bakeware, silverware, dishes, glasses, bowls, French press, mugs, microwave, kitchen towels, cleaning products, ceiling lights with fan.
Bathroom has tub and shower with curtain, standard sink, toilet, 4 storage cabinets, large body towels, hand towels, facecloths.
Living room is furnished with sofa, Smart TV, Sony Sound bar with sub-woofer,  coffee table with matching side tables, 2 matching lamps.
Primary Bedroom is furnished with a queen size bed, new sheet set, new pillows, comforter, 2 end tables with lamps, a full size dresser and mirror, 2 walk in closets.
2nd bedroom can be used as an office which includes a Multifunction printer/scanner/copier.
Spare toner, spare drum and 3 reams of letter size paper on a stand up desk.
Large private front porch with furniture.
2 dedicated parking spots next to house.
All utilities, heat, electric, cooking fuel, gas, water, basic cable, basic internet, trash pickup and yard maintenance included.
